function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Development of accurate and reliable sensor technology for cough and lung sound monitoring, integration with digital health platforms for real-time analysis.","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing wearable-based tele-ecg monitoring to reduce staff-to-patient contact.","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementing remote blood pressure monitoring to reduce staff work load and contact with patients.","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement real-time continuous monitoring of bp using wearable technologies and address the obstacles related to accuracy and calibration.","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overcome obstacles related to accuracy and calibration by improving monitoring technology and developing adaptive algorithms for bp estimation.","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement strict data protection measures and obtain explicit consent for data usage.","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Continuous validation and refinement of ai algorithms using verified clinical data. human oversight for decision-making.","category":"Monitoring and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Regular validation of predictions with real-world data, human expert input in decision-making.","category":"Monitoring and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Validation of model with clinical data and continuous improvement of algorithm","category":"Monitoring and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ethical guidelines for ai use, transparency in ai decision-making, oversight by medical experts","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Validation of models with real-world data, continuous improvement of algorithms, integration of multiple data sources","category":"Monitoring and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement strict hygiene protocols for wearable devices and regular disinfection","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular validation and calibration of ai models, involvement of human experts in treatment decisions","category":"Monitoring and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Strong data encryption, compliance with privacy regulations, continuous security monitoring","category":"Managing drinking water safety measures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improved resource management techniques in cloud, edge, and fog computing environments","category":"Control of airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilization of wearables for remote monitoring and diagnosis, reducing the need for travel","category":"Implement \"multi-use\" / modular designs","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Development and implementation of cloud computing technologies for scalable and personalized healthcare infrastructures","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement strict hygiene and sanitation protocols for edge and fog computing infrastructure","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Provide comprehensive training and guidelines on hygiene and sanitation best practices for operators and users","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of redundant communication channels and decentralized data processing capabilities","category":"Implement \"multi-use\" / modular designs","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Regular cleaning and sterilization of wearable devices and environmental sensors, strict hygiene protocols for healthcare staff and family members, and use of antimicrobial materials in device construction.","category":"Personal hygiene (eg communication of hygiene protocols.","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Research and development of affordable sensing units, government subsidies or financial assistance programs, and partnerships with social organizations for device distribution.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular calibration and validation of wearable sensors, in combination with other detection methods, can help improve accuracy.","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementation of robust encryption, access controls, and audit trails for secure sharing of cemrs.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Develop comprehensive symptom screening methods and use of reliable technologies","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Develop and implement digital contact tracing solutions, increase public health measures","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct empirical studies to evaluate digital solutions, establish standards for effectiveness assessment","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular calibration and testing of the tools, combined with public health messaging on their limitations","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Access to mental health support services, promotion of stress management techniques, and community-based initiatives","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Development of device-agnostic wearable technology with improved diagnostic capabilities","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement crowd management measures at the remaining access points, such as queue management and social distancing markers.","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement validation measures to ensure the objectivity and impartiality of the selection process. use multiple sources of data to confirm the findings from participant engagement.","category":"Monitoring and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement automated data replication processes, regular data integrity checks, disaster recovery planning.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of secure storage solutions, encryption of medical data","category":"Greywater management","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct rigorous clinical trials and research to assess the safety and efficacy of experimental drugs for covid-19 treatment","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Clinical trials and research to establish safety and efficacy","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conducting adequate studies with realistic eligibility criteria of control sampler, double-checking testing procedures, and regular verification of testing accuracy","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Provide clear and specific instructions for rating retrospective health measures and utilize additional objective measures where possible to validate self-reported data.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Consider using a finer-grained scale or supplementing self-rated measures with validated health characteristics, and broader socioeconomic factors to account for potential confounders in the analysis.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"}]}
